      • haveAllDownloadsCompleted

        public static boolean haveAllDownloadsCompleted(@NonNull
                                                android.content.Context context)
        Checks if all the files in the download list are in the file system.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        Returns:
        True if all the files in the download list are in the file system. False otherwise.

      • assetFileExists

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
public static boolean assetFileExists(@NonNull
                                                                android.content.Context context,
                                                                @NonNull
                                                                java.lang.String assetName)
        Checks if the indicated asset exists in the file system.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        assetName - Asset file name to check if it exists.
        Returns:
        True if the indicated asset exists in the file system. False otherwise.

      • getDownloadsDir

        @NonNull
public static java.io.File getDownloadsDir(@NonNull
                                                    android.content.Context context)
        Returns download dir. Please note that com.intel.wearable.cloudsdk.blobstore.CloudPublicBlobStore does have Context.getExternalFilesDir(String) hardcoded in so we have to use it too.
